summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5808 for the improvement of Alaska Street, from Empire Way to 35th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 76585 as amended by Ordinance No. 76842 and 77345, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
